item.title: ESG Stocks
item.description: I have a definitely-not-well-thought-out theory about ESG(Environmental, Social and Goverance) stocks. Hunch: ESG stocks will perform better in the broader sense(Higher profits, Higher earnings). In 10th grade I remember our English teacher asking whether it is moral for a person to own a luxury car since it is so polluting and one of my classmates made the point that people buy luxury cars more of a status symbol than for its characteristics.
